channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: People danced in the streets of Damascus after Trump vowed to end all sanctions on Syria. His administration is unsure how best to proceed
item.description: The country's transition government is reportedly weeks away from "collapse and a full-scale civil war" as ISIS waits in the wings.

item.title: Kermit the Frog’s sage advice for new grads: ‘Rather than jumping over someone to get what you want, consider reaching out your hand… life is better when we leap together’
item.description: Jim Henson, the creator of the Muppets and Kermit the Frog, graduated from the University of Maryland in 1960.

item.title: Trump ‘reverse Robin Hood’ tax bill is driving up the cost of buying a home, Democrats say
item.description: "Trump and Republicans are directly responsible for the spike in the 30-year Treasury bond yield and mortgage rates,” said the fourth highest ranking ...

item.title: 3 key takeaways from RFK Jr.’s controversial MAHA report that could change America
item.description: Increased scrutiny of childhood vaccines—credited with saving millions of people from deadly diseases— figures prominently in the report.

item.title: Trump blasts out bevy of threats against Apple and the EU, saying imported iPhones face a 25% hike
item.description: Writing on Truth Social, President Trump put pressure on both Apple and the EU to get behind his 'America First' policy.

item.title: Tesla's stock swings to a loss on fears of an escalating trade war with Europe
Why one hedge-fund manager thinks the U.S. economy will boom
Why Trump's newest tariff threat against Apple is misguided
Trump threatens EU with 50% tariffs; U.S. stock futures tumble
U.S. stock futures swing lower after Trump threatens Apple with tariffs
